00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         MHitTime
00004   Created by:   John R Quirk
00005 
00006   Contents:     A module that plots the time of hits relative to muSC
00007 
00008 \********************************************************************/
00009 
00010 /* Standard includes */
00011 #include <stdio.h>
00012 #include <stdlib.h>
00013 #include <string>
00014 #include <sstream>
00015 
00016 /* MIDAS includes */
00017 
00018 /* ROOT includes */
00019 #include <TH1I.h>
00020 
00021 /* AlCap includes */
00022 #include "TGlobalData.h"
00023 #include "TSetupData.h"
00024 
00025 using std::string;
00026 using std::map;
00027 using std::vector;
00028 using std::pair;
00029 
00030 /*-- Module declaration --------------------------------------------*/
00031 INT  MHitTime_init(void);
00032 INT  MHitTime(EVENT_HEADER*, void*);
00033 
00034 extern HNDLE hDB;
00035 extern TGlobalData* gData;
00036 extern TSetupData* gSetup;
00037 
00038 static TH1I* hTime_MuSC;
00039 static std::map< std::string, TH1I* > hEventTimes;
00040 static std::map< std::string, TH1I* > hBlockTimes;
00041 
00042 const static double BLOCKLENGTH = 10000000.; // ns
00043 const static double CUTWINDOW = 10000.; // ns
00044 
00045 ANA_MODULE MHitTime_module =
00046 {
00047   "MHitTime",                    /* module name           */
00048   "John R Quirk",              /* author                */
00049   MHitTime,                      /* event routine         */
00050   NULL,                          /* BOR routine           */
00051   NULL,                          /* EOR routine           */
00052   MHitTime_init,                 /* init routine          */
00053   NULL,                          /* exit routine          */
00054   NULL,                          /* parameter structure   */
00055   0,                             /* structure size        */
00056   NULL,                          /* initial parameters    */
00057 };
00058 
00059 
00060 INT MHitTime_init()
00061 {
00062 
00063   std::map< std::string, std::vector<TPulseIsland*> >& tpis = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00064   std::map< std::string, std::vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator iBank;
00065   std::map< std::string, std::string> dets = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00066   
00067   std::string cBank, cDet;
00068   hBlockTimes.clear();
00069   hEventTimes.clear();
00070   hTime_MuSC = new TH1I("hTime_MuSC", "Hit Times of MuSC;Block Hit Time (ns);Counts",
00071                                 100, 0., BLOCKLENGTH);
00072   for (iBank = tpis.begin(); iBank != tpis.end(); iBank++) {
00073     cBank = iBank->first;
00074     cDet = dets[cBank];
00075     if (cDet == "muSC")
00076       continue;
00077     hBlockTimes[cDet] = new TH1I(("hBlockTime_" + cDet).c_str(), ("Block Hit Times of " + cDet + ";Time (ns); Counts").c_str(),
00078                                  100, 0., BLOCKLENGTH);
00079     hEventTimes[cDet] = new TH1I(("hEventTime_" + cDet).c_str(), ("Event Hit Times of " + cDet +";Time (ns); Counts").c_str(),
00080                                  100, 0., CUTWINDOW);
00081   }
00082   return SUCCESS;
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 INT MHitTime(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00087 {
00088 
00089   // We assume the existance of all necessary TPI vectors
00090   std::map< std::string, std::vector<TPulseIsland*> >& tpis = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00091   std::map< std::string, std::string>& dets = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00092   std::map< std::string, std::string>& banks = gSetup->fDetectorToBankMap;
00093 
00094   std::vector<TPulseIsland*> muons = tpis.at(banks.at("muSC"));
00095 
00096   std::map< std::string, std::vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator iBank;
00097   std::map< std::string, std::string>::iterator iDet;
00098   std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator cMuon;
00099   std::map< std::string, std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator > pulses;
00100   for (iBank = tpis.begin(); iBank != tpis.end(); iBank++)
00101     if(iBank->first != banks.at("muSC"))
00102       pulses[iBank->first] = iBank->second.begin();
00103       
00104 
00105   double t_mu;
00106   double t[2];
00107   std::string cDet, cBank;
00108   for (cMuon = muons.begin(); cMuon != muons.end(); cMuon++) {
00109     t_mu = (*cMuon)->GetPulseTime();
00110     hTime_MuSC->Fill(t_mu);
00111     for (iDet = dets.begin(); iDet != dets.end(); iDet++) {
00112       cBank = iDet->first;
00113       cDet = iDet->second;
00114       std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator& cPulse = pulses.at(cBank);
00115       if (cPulse == tpis.at(cBank).end())
00116         continue;
00117       t[0] = (*cPulse)->GetPulseTime();
00118       t[1] = t[0] - t_mu;
00119       hBlockTimes.at(cDet)->Fill(t[0]);
00120       while (t[1] < 0.) {
00121         cPulse++;
00122         t[0] = (*cPulse)->GetPulseTime();
00123         t[1] = t[0] - t_mu;
00124         hBlockTimes.at(cDet)->Fill(t[0]);
00125       }
00126       while (t[1] < CUTWINDOW) {
00127         hEventTimes.at(cDet)->Fill(t[1]);
00128         cPulse++;
00129         t[0] = (*cPulse)->GetPulseTime();
00130         t[1] = t[0] - t_mu;
00131         hBlockTimes.at(cDet)->Fill(t[0]);
00132       }
00133     }
00134   }
00135 
00136   // Are there any pulses left?
00137   for (iDet = dets.begin(); iDet != dets.end(); iDet++) {
00138     cBank = iDet->first;
00139     cDet = iDet->second;
00140     std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator cPulse = pulses.at(cBank);
00141     while(cPulse != tpis.at(cBank).end()) {
00142       t[0] = (*cPulse)->GetPulseTime();
00143       hBlockTimes[cDet]->Fill(t[0]);
00144       cPulse++;
00145     }
00146   }
00147 
00148   return SUCCESS;
00149 }
